metadata.description: The blow-up hit series from 2013 is back with an all-new, all-monthly series! Rock returns home to find his city under siege, and you won't believe who's behind the mayhem. Featuring a LIBERTY JUSTICE back-up from Tyler Shainline and the Emmy Award winning Andy Suriano (Doc Bizarre & Samurai Jack).
metadata.name: Burn the Orphanage: Reign of Terror
